title: XDM Contact and Lead common B2B attributes
description: Common B2B attributes for contacts and leads.

sourceType.title: Source Type
sourceType.description: Type of Source system. It could be CRM or a in house system.

isDeleted.title: Deleted Indicator
isDeleted.description: Indicator whether the instance was deleted.

ownerID.title: Owner ID
ownerID.description: The unique identofier for the Owner of the contact/lead record.

isEmailBounced.title: Email Bounced Indicator
isEmailBounced.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact/lead, indicates whether the email bounced (true) or not (false).

emailBouncedDate.title: Email Bounced Date
emailBouncedDate.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact/lead, provides the date when the email was bounced.

emailBouncedReason.title: Email Bounced Reason
emailBouncedReason.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact/lead, provides the reason for bounced email.

status.title: Lead/Contact Status
status.description: Field recording the current marketing/sales status of the lead/contact.
